column1: Sen. Ted Cruz took to Twitter to call me a “complete ass” & my request for all senators to wear a mask “idiotic.”  Wearing a mask is about leading by example & protecting everyone including essential workers.  Join me & tell Sen Republicans to mask up.⬇️ https://t.co/DEgFnDN2XF

This is your LAST CHANCE to vote and make your voice heard in this election -- there are still a few hours left before polls close.  Please take a moment to watch my video and then share it with 5 friends and make sure they have a plan to #VOTE today. #ElectionDay https://t.co/OtFk83NEEl

Start by finding 5 people -- family members friends coworkers or neighbors -- & call text email or FaceTime to make sure they have a plan to #VOTE today.  And then go one step further by volunteering to join a phone bank or text bank session >> https://t.co/E6EDnDIirx
But don't stop there. With hours still to go before polls close there’s still more we can all do -- none of us want to wake up tomorrow thinking that we could have done a little bit more.
#OHIO Click here to see the @OHDems sample ballot: https://t.co/ymyngzg4jv

🗳️ Click here to find your polling place: https://t.co/2XpkXM3IzC  If you have any questions call the voter hotline at 833-336-8683 or text ACESS to 43367. Find more voter protection resources at https://t.co/JsDqrrBCn7

Today is Election Day -- the moment we’ve been working toward for months but the election isn’t over until polls close & every last ballot is counted. If you haven’t voted yet it’s time to get out & #VOTE to elect champions for the Dignity of Work. Here are some resources: 👇

I asked @JoeBiden to come to Cleveland today because I know we can win in Ohio. If we all do our part we can elect champions for the Dignity of Work like Joe up and down the ballot tomorrow. https://t.co/1JRJF2apht

We need a champion for workers with the experience to get the job done in the Senate. That’s the Doug I know.  We can’t afford to lose @DougJones in the Senate.   Please chip in any amount you can. 2 days. Let's win. https://t.co/0gh0EQ7wc7 https://t.co/2pR4ygvUyf

.@KateForCongress & @TimsDesiree are the Ohio women we need in Congress fighting the Dignity of Work. These red-to-blue races are as close as it gets -- they need all of us to pitch in and help get them across the finish line. https://t.co/rWgJXTpJBt

.@JoeBiden will empower workers to get the best deal with the highest wages & health care & a voice on the job.  Joe will have your back at the bargaining table because he knows what it means to carry a union card & how hard you have to fight.  Watch share & #VOTE. https://t.co/qEpkQehArU

It feels good to #VOTE knowing that you're playing a role in changing this country. Knowing you can tell your kids and grandkids ‘I did this for my country and it mattered and it had an impact.'
Think your vote doesn’t matter?  Think again. The 2016 presidential election came down to less than 80000 votes in three states.
Another reason @JoeBiden is the right choice for workers & unions:  ✅@JoeBiden will put Ohioans to work building things in America.  Watch share & #VOTE.  https://t.co/1g4FPCPHOn

As American workers head to voting booths and mail in ballots in numbers so large they cannot be ignored they send a clear message to political leaders: we are the backbone of this country our work has dignity and you cannot continue to exploit us.

Ohio workers are tough -- we don't need a president who sugarcoats things we need a president who tells the truth and empowers us with a plan to get to work to beat this virus instead of lying about it. That's @JoeBiden.  Watch share & #VOTE . - SB https://t.co/aFNpjxqVGo

#DignityofWorkBingo is back! Make sure you download our *updated* bingo card before @JoeBiden and Trump take the debate stage in #Cleveland.   Let us know every time you hear the candidates say one of these key phrases. 👇#Debates2020 https://t.co/sxOCOF3dG1 https://t.co/iljl9VXo7W
Americans are tired of Trump's phony populism and broken promises. Together we can elect a president who will finally be on workers' side. https://t.co/JsDqrrBCn7
When Smithfield a multibillion-dollar corporation owned by the Chinese communist government failed to protect its workers Trump handed out a paltry fine of just $10 per worker.
Trump attacked Goodyear -- an iconic Akron-based company that employs 64000 workers -- to fuel his petty political grievances.
Trump refuses to raise the minimum wage for workers.
Trump and his administration have made it even easier for corporations to bust unions.

Trump promised to protect #SocialSecurity and #Medicare but he told his rich friends in Davos he would pay for his corporate tax cuts by cutting Social Security and Medicare and is gutting them through his latest tax scam the payroll tax freeze.

Trump is trying to use the Supreme Court to eliminate the ACA taking health coverage away from more than 740000 Ohioans and putting more than 5 MILLION Ohioans at risk of losing protections for pre-existing conditions.
Trump failed to protect essential frontline workers while they put their lives at risk to keep our country going during the pandemic.
Trump took away the $600 per week in unemployment insurance for 680000 Ohioans in the middle of an economic crisis.
Almost 1 MILLION Ohio workers lost their jobs because of Trump’s failure to respond to the pandemic.
Trump made it easier for employers to reduce and take away overtime pay from hundreds of thousands of Ohio workers.
Trump stacked the courts and the Department of Labor with corporate lawyers who would side with his anti-worker agenda.
Trump wasted trillions of workers’ tax dollars on a massive handout to Wall Street and his wealthy friends.
In 2016 Trump promised to fight for Ohio workers but failed to lift a finger when GM abandoned Lordstown taking 4500 jobs with it.
Before @JoeBiden and President Trump take the debate stage tonight in Cleveland we’re counting down Trump’s worst betrayals of Ohio workers. #Debates2020
